name: Traffic Car Jam - Traffic Games: Traffic Car Run
name_original: Traffic Car Jam - Traffic Games: Traffic Car Run
description:
Our new fun and leisure game Traffic Car Jam - Traffic Games: Traffic Car Run is calling you! Drive vehicles in the traffic run game, avoid all kinds of obstacles and safely reach the end of this awesome traffic rider game.

Traffic Car Jam - Traffic Games: Traffic Car Run is the most challenging, fast paced, action packed tap game ever! Show your driving skills in the city traffic jam by safely and smoothly crossing all the traffic in the car rush game.

Features of Traffic Car Jam:

Simple, easy and effective controls

Smooth and realistic car driving features

Simple, pure, innovative gameplay

Enjoyable action driving

Dodge other vehicles

Collect coins on the road and buy new car models

Free to play

Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.trafficridergame.gravitycode
